node.detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，曾參與過加拿大黃刀鎮旅行團，與同團另外幾名患者（第 238 、 242 、 261 、 268 及 306 宗個案患者）並不認識，曾隨團到秘魯及玻利維亞等地，目前在威爾斯醫院留醫。
node.detail_en: The patient has underlying illness and attended the tour to Yellow Knife Town from Canada.  She did not know other patients (no #238, #242, #261, #268, #306), but she went to Peru and Bolivia with the tour.   She is now in Prince of Wales Hospital.

groups.description_zh: 7 名港人同遊加拿大，期間參加了當地本地團前往黃刀鎮、玻利維亞、秘魯、亞馬遜河等，返港後多名團員確診。
groups.description_en: 7 Hongkongers touring to Canada and further to Yellowknife, Bolivia, Peru and Amazon were confirmed infected upon return to Hong Kong.

node.location_zh: 加拿大航空 AC007 ( 座位 27C )

node.location_en: Fook Lam House, Kwong Lam Court

node.remarks_zh: 加拿大黃刀鎮旅行團的成員，但與另外幾名患者（第238、242、261、268及306號個案）並不認識
node.remarks_en: Joined a tour at Yellowknife, Canada. He do not know other patients of that tour (case no. 238, 242, 261, 268 & 306).

node.remarks_zh: 加拿大黃刀鎮旅行團的成員，但與另外幾名患者（第238、242、261、268及306號個案）並不認識
node.remarks_en: Joined a tour at Yellowknife, Canada. He do not know other patients of that tour (case no. 238, 242, 261, 268 & 306).
Developed fever and cough since Mar 14
